INITIATE_CARGO_SCAN_1.message: A' toiseach air sganadh air a' charago.

INITIATE_CARGO_SCAN_2.message: Cumaibh ur luaths is comhair a chom sganadh carago.

NOTHING_DETECTED.message: Cha do mhothaich sinn dha charago mì-laghail. Faodaidh sibh dol air adhart.

OUTLAW_DETECTED_1.message: Tha fògrach as aithne dhuinn a’ stiùireadh {ship_label}. Gabhamaid air gus a mhilleadh!

OUTLAW_DETECTED_2.message: Cuiridh sinn crìoch ort, a shlaighteir!

OUTLAW_DETECTED_3.message: Haoth, fhuair sinn greim ort! Chan fhaigh thusa beò as an t-siostam seo!

POLICE_TAUNT_2.message: A chùiltear, is daor a cheannach ort a-nis!

RESPECT_THE_LAW_1.message: Thoiribh urram dhan lagh! Chan fhiach an eucoir ann an siostam {system}!

RESPECT_THE_LAW_2.message: Thàinig sibh a-steach do shiostam {system}. Thoiribh urram dhan lagh!

TAKE_A_HIKE.message: Fhuair thu às leis. Tog ort ma-thà!
